result.title: Comparative cross-case report on Mountain Value Chains
result.description: A participatory, comparative assessment and a critical benchmarking of the clusters will be performed. A cross-case workshop will be organized for each cluster in order to use the expert-judgement gathered in the previous task to weight the relevance of the different variables in the vulnerability, sustainability and resilience of the clusters of VCs. This cross-case visits gathering actors of the different VCs also aim to promote peer-to-peer exchange of experiences and potential solutions that enhance the sustainability of the VCs.

project.title: Mountain Valorization through Interconnectedness and Green Growth
